TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it's one over by a harvester.

I wish for NASA to send a probe to Uranus.

You come back from NASA with a supreme butt ach

I wish to be a kerbal

Granted, you are now one of Danny's Kerbals.

I wish for 2 milkshakes.

Granted, They are poisoned with cyanide and you die.

I wish to die a painful, terrible, long death.

Granted. Instead you die a peaceful death.

I wish I was better at KSP.

Granted. You are now better at killing space pandas. You monster

I wish to be GLADOS

Granted, but Portal 2 becomes non-canon, and you remain dead after Portal: Still Alive.

I wish my brother was less irritating.

Granted your brother gains immunity to all irritating allergys and infections. What I nice person you are.

I wish for a million loyal kerbal minions!

Granted. They fly rockets which crash into you every time. One million tons of capsule for you!

I wish that I could instantly understand all programming languages.

Granted every computer language is now known to you be it human or not, you now sit in a corner twitching and babbling do to mental over load.

I wish for a Nerva

Granted, but it melts your face off.

I wish for power.

Granted you get one potion of enchanting

I wish i had my face back

Granted, but the NERVA is still there, and it melts it off again.

I wish was able to have a cake.

Granted but it has my face in it!

I wish the Nerva was gone (you know where I'm going)

Granted. It is attached to the latest model Kerbal-X. Unfortunately when Jeb tries to fly away with it, there is a loss of control accident that results in the rocket crashing into your house and exploding, turning your household into a nuclear wasteland.

I wish fusion could be achieved using ductape.

Granted all duct tape in the world can now fuss with anything and make it In to duct tape as well, the duct tape viruse speads.

I now wish to have my face back again!

Granted, but you are mistaken for a criminal and imprison forever.

I wish I could get some more sleep.

Granted: I drag you to prison with me where your put in the dark abase that is salutary confinement.

I wish for an iron-man suit, made of animatium!

Granted, but I'm pretty sure animatium is not a real element or compound, so there fore it must be discovered first. After 1000 years pf you waiting it is discovered. Apparently it has similar properties to chlorine triflouride, but even more deadly. nevertheless, you get an iron man suit made out of it.

I wish global warming didn't exist.

Granted. Just use this device to add dust to the atmosphere to scatter the sunlight and lower earth's temperature, completely offsetting the effects of global warming.

Oh by the way, don't breathe the stuff coming out of it. Its not good for your lungs at all and could probably kill you.

I wish I had a better computer.

(I'm an IT professional btw. You're going to have to do better than "but it gets a virus" or "but it breaks". Its my job to deal with such things)

Granted. You got a new super computer. It is liquid cooled because it is the best computer, and it heats up a lot. The pipe holding the liquid breaks, and destroys the computer. All your work, taxes, and personal documents are lost. This causes you to go poor, not having enough money to pay for your food. You die, starved and homeless. As you die, you realise, no one loved you enough to give you money.

I wish to be better at Blender modeling

Granted. You can now sculpt blenders out of clay.

I wish for 'Muhricuh.

Granted. It is the name of a Blender I made.

I wish to be better at modeling in the program, Blender.

Granted, but all copies of blender you touch turn the computer running it into a kitchen blender

I wish to remember to post on the forums more often

Granted, but you forget how to breathe.

I wish for a smooth criminal.
